name: Deliveo plugin for WordPress
author: Deliveo

sections.description: This plugin allows You to transfer WooCommerce orders into Deliveo Courier System via API. For using this plugin, You have to get a license Deliveo Courier Software here: https://deliveo.eu
sections.installation:
1. Log into WordPress admin, navigate to Plugins, and click Add New.
  2. Search: Deliveo
  3. Click Install.
  4. Done. ðŸ™‚
